chocan

Class ManageAccounts

  • java.lang.Object
    • chocan.ManageAccounts

  • public class ManageAccounts
extends java.lang.Object
    ManageAccounts: Main controller class for OperatorTerminal. Lets operator add, update, and delete members and providers in the database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hunter Esposito

    • Method Detail

      • addMember

        public static boolean addMember(java.lang.String name,
                                int number,
                                java.lang.String address,
                                java.lang.String city,
                                java.lang.String state,
                                int zip)
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Function to add a new member to the database
        Parameters:
        name - New member's name
        number - New member's member number
        address - New member's home address
        city - New member's home city
        state - New member's home state
        zip - New members home zip code
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean, true if member was added successfully, false if member number is longer than 9 digits.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • deleteMember

                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Function to delete a member from the database
        Parameters:
        number - Member number to be found
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if number is greater than or less than 9 digits

      • updateMember

        public static int updateMember(java.lang.String name,
                               int number,
                               java.lang.String address,
                               java.lang.String city,
                               java.lang.String state,
                               int zip)
                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Function to update an existing members information
        Parameters:
        name - member's updated name
        number - member's updated member #
        address - member's updated address
        city - member's updated city
        state - member's updated state
        zip - member's updated zip code
        Returns:
        An int as a return code
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if member number is not 9 digits long
